Contributor: Godwin, Frank, 1889- artist.; Liberty Loan Committee.;
Note: Initialed "F.G." (i.e., Frank Godwin). Dates based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Copy for an advertisement for an unspecified Liberty Loan campaign.  No pictorial content. Text says to all employers that they have a duty to give the opportunity to their employees to purchase a Liberty bond by small payments, which could be taken out of their wages.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: To all employers
